long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An application that provides simple and easy access to the management of the SMAC16 family of controllers.
SMAC16 is a free firmware for controllers based on the ESP32 chip.
This is used to control all kinds of aquarium devices such as lighting, dosing pumps, timers, heating and cooling.
You can download the firmware here: https://github.com/bbasil2012/SSLAC-ESP32
